MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the TD11 postcode area of Duns. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.08pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Allanton substation to investigate the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:24 PM on Wednesday, 30 December 2020.
